resources.string: MicroG does not run in the background.
Enable cloud messaging settings to receive notifications.
"Showing DeArrow thumbnails. If a video has no DeArrow thumbnails then the original YouTube thumbnails are shown."
"Showing DeArrow thumbnails. If a video has no DeArrow thumbnails then still video captures are shown."

"DeArrow provides crowd-sourced thumbnails for YouTube videos. These thumbnails are often more relevant than those provided by YouTube. If enabled, video URLs will be sent to the API server and no other data is sent.
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow."
"The URL of the DeArrow thumbnail cache endpoint. Do not change this unless you know what you're doing."
Toast is not shown if DeArrow is not available.
Toast is shown if DeArrow is not available.
Show a toast if API is not available
Still captures are taken from the beginning / middle / end of each video. These images are built into YouTube and no external API is used.
Using medium quality still captures. Thumbnails will load faster, but live streams, unreleased, and very old videos may show blank thumbnails.
Not using YouTube still video captures.
Video time to take the still from
Append time stamp information is disabled.
Append time stamp information is enabled.
Ambient mode is disabled in battery saver mode.
Ambient mode is enabled in battery saver mode.
Invalid start page, resetting to default.

"Automatically close interstitial ads.
Note: This feature hasn't been tested."
Configure which components to filter, separated by new lines.
Invalid custom filter (must be ASCII only): %s
Invalid custom playback speeds. Reset to default values.
Add or change available playback speeds.
Custom speeds can\'t be more than %sx. Reset to default values.
Old style flyout panel is used.
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent.
Player overlay opacity must be between 0-100. Reset to default values.
Type the hex code of the seekbar color.
To open RVX in an external browser, turn on \'Open supported links\' and enable supported web addresses.
Default video quality on Mobile network
Default video quality on Wi-Fi network
Default playback speed is enabled in live stream.
Default playback speed is disabled in live stream.
Disable playback speed in live stream
Landscape mode when entering fullscreen is enabled.
Landscape mode when entering fullscreen is disabled.

"Disable 'Playing at 2x speed' while holding down.
Note: Disabling the speed overlay restores the 'Slide to seek' behavior of the old layout."
Shorts player is enabled at app startup.
Shorts player is disabled at app startup.
Disable shorts player at app startup
Disables the \"Update your app\" screen that appears when using an outdated client.
The amount of seconds the double press back to exit.
Entering fullscreen when swiping down below the video player is disabled.
Entering fullscreen when swiping down below the video player is enabled.
Debug logs do not include buffer.
Default playback speed does not apply to Shorts.
Default playback speed applies to Shorts.
New style quality options are shown.
Old style quality options are shown.
Apply opus audio codec instead of mp4a audio codec.
Tricks the dpi to use some phone layouts.
Does not save playback speed values even when changing playback speed.
Save the playback speed value whenever you change the playback speed.
Does not save video quality values even when changing video quality.
Save the video quality value whenever you change the video quality.
Even if the brightness is set to 0 by swiping, auto brightness is not activated.
When brightness reaches 0 by swiping, auto brightness is activated.
Touch and hold to activate swipe gesture.
Tricks the dpi to use some tablet layouts.
Spoof device information to enable video codec.

"Enabling this setting will disable the settings button in the You tab.
In this case, please use the following path: You tab > View channel > Menu > Settings."
Enable wide search bar in You tab
Import or export settings as text.
%s is not installed. Please install it.
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or YTDLnis.
Settings for using an external downloader.

"Videos will be switched to fullscreen in the following situations:
• When a timestamp in the comments is clicked on. • When a video is started."
"Hide elements of the account menu and You tab. Some components may not be hidden."
Auto player popup panels are shown.
Auto player popup panels are hidden.
Like and dislike buttons are shown.
Like and dislike buttons are hidden.
Open mix playlist button is shown.
Open mix playlist button is hidden.
Save to playlist button is shown.
Save to playlist button is hidden.
Hide category bar in related video
Hide category bar in search results
Channel avatar section of the subscriptions feed is shown.
Channel avatar section of the subscriptions feed is hidden.
Links at the top of channel profile is shown.
Links at the top of channel profile is hidden.
Comments by members banner is shown.
Comments by members banner is hidden.
Community posts in home feed are shown.
Community posts in home feed are hidden.
Hide community posts in home feed
Community posts in related video are shown.
Community posts in related video are hidden.
Hide community posts in related video
Community posts in subscriptions feed are shown.
Community posts in subscriptions feed are hidden.
Hide community posts in subscriptions feed
Create button in navigation bar is shown.
Create button in navigation bar is hidden.
Emoji picker and time stamp are shown.
Emoji picker and time stamp are hidden.
Hide emoji picker and time stamp
Home button in navigation bar is shown.
Home button in navigation bar is hidden.
Library button in navigation bar is shown.
Library button in navigation bar is hidden.
Notifications button in navigation bar is shown.
Notifications button in navigation bar is hidden.
Hide notify me button in feed
Listen with YouTube Music menu is shown.
Listen with YouTube Music menu is hidden.
Hide listen with YouTube Music menu
Stats for nerds menu is shown.
Stats for nerds menu is hidden.
Watch in VR menu is shown.
Watch in VR menu is hidden.
This changes the size of the comment section, so it is impossible to open a live chat replay in the comment section.
This does not change the size of the comment section, so it is possible to open the live chat replay in the comment section.
Hide related videos in quick actions
Hide search bar in home feed
Thumbnails in the search term history are shown.
Thumbnails in the search term history are hidden.
Shorts button in navigation bar is shown.
Shorts button in navigation bar is hidden.
Hides Shorts section or the Shorts player component.

"Hides Shorts shelves.
Known issue: Official headers in search results will be hidden."
Subscriptions button in navigation bar is shown.
Subscriptions button in navigation bar is hidden.
Hides suggested video overlay to play next.
When you finished a video, another play automatically

"Identifies the suggestions shelf through the browse id.
Known issues: • When Browseid is not identified, suggestions shelf may not be hidden."

"Identifies the suggestions shelf through the current tab.
Known issues: • More drawer shelves may be hidden. • Playlist shelves may be hidden."
"Hides following shelves: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Listen again • Shopping • Watch it Again"
Create and Notification buttons are shown.
Create and Notification buttons are hidden.
Hide videos with \"Only for Membership\" tag in Home Feed
Hide membership videos in Home Feed
"Hide videos with gray description from search results. Videos with a gray description include videos that are not related to search terms."
"Hide videos with less than 1,000 views exposed to the home feed. Some videos, including those from channels you subscribe to, may not be hidden even if they have fewer than 1,000 views."
"Replace download button with external download button."
Keeps landscape mode when turning the screen off and on in fullscreen.
The amount of milliseconds the landscape mode is forced.
"Tap to toggle always repeat states. Tap and hold to toggle pause after repeat states."
"Tap to copy video URL. Tap and hold to copy video URL with timestamp."
"Tap to copy video URL with timestamp. Tap and hold to copy video timestamp."
"Tap to generate a playlist of all videos from channel from oldest to newest. Tap and hold to undo."
"Tap to open speed dialog. Tap and hold to set playback speed to 1.0x."
Tap to launch add channel into Channel Whitelist.
Channel %s was added to the %s whitelist
Failed to add channel %s to the %s whitelist
Failed to retrieve channel details, received message %d
Reboot to apply channel whitelist settings
Channel %s was removed from the %s whitelist
Failed to remove channel %s from the %s whitelist
Check or remove the list of channels added to the whitelist
To hide the additional settings menu, hide all settings in the additional settings category.
Configure the spacing from the seekbar to the quick action container, between 0-64.
Quick actions top margin must be between 0-64. Reset to default values.
"Remove viewer discretion dialog. This does not bypass the age restriction. It just accepts it automatically."
Restart to load the layout normally
Dislike data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more.
Like button styled for best appearance.
Like button styled for minimum width.
Dislikes temporarily not available (API timed out).
Dislikes not available (client API limit reached).
Limitation: Dislikes may not appear in certain situations.
Show a toast if API is not available
Toast is not shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available.
Toast is shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available.
Removes tracking query parameters from the URLs when sharing links.
Changing default mobile data quality to %s.
URL with timestamp copied to clipboard.
Back button in the toolbar cannot be hidden.
Known issue: Title disappears when clicked.

"Skip preloaded buffer at video start to bypass default video quality enforcement delay.
• When the video starts, there is a delay of approximately 0.7 seconds, but the default video quality is applied immediately. • Does not apply to HDR videos, live stream videos, videos shorter than 10 seconds."

"Spoofing the client version to the old version.
• This will change the appearance of the app, but unknown side effects may occur. • If later turned off, the old UI may remain until clear the app data."
18.09.39 - Restore old library tab (Disable You Tab)
18.38.45 - Restore old default video quality behavior
"18.40.34 - Disables 'views' and 'likes' from being updated in real time"
18.42.41 - Fixes issue where theme is not applied in search results
Type the spoof app version target.
Spoofs the device dimensions in order to unlock higher video qualities that may not be available on your device.

"Player parameter not spoofed for feed videos.
Known issue: Feed videos will play for less than 1 minute before encountering playback issues."

"Player parameter spoofed for feed videos.
Known issue: Automatically played feed videos will show up in your watch history."

"Spoofs player parameters to prevent playback issues.
Known issues: • Enhanced bitrate is not available. • No seekbar thumbnails for paid videos. • Offline downloads may not work. • Video may not start from the last watched time."
"Swipe gestures are disabled in 'Lock screen' mode."
"Swipe gestures are enabled in 'Lock screen' mode."
The amount of threshold for swipe to occur.
The visibility of swipe overlay background.
The text size for swipe overlay.
The amount of milliseconds the overlay is visible.

"Swap the positions of the create button and notification button by spoofing the device's information.
• Even if you change this setting, it may not take effect until you reboot the device. • Disabling this setting loads more ads from the server side. • You should disable this setting to make video ads visible."
SponsorBlock is a crowd-sourced system for skipping annoying parts of YouTube videos.
Segment voting button is not shown.
Skip button styled for minimum width.
Skip button styled for best appearance.
Skip button hides after a few seconds.
Skip button displayed for entire segment.
Show a toast when skipping automatically
Toast is shown when a segment is automatically skipped. Tap here to see an example.
Toast is not shown. Tap here to see an example.
Video length minus all segments, shown in parentheses next to the full video length.
Create new segment button is shown.
Create new segment button is not shown.
Number of milliseconds the time adjustment buttons move when creating new segments.
Value must be a positive number.
Guidelines contain rules and tips for creating new segments.
Read the SponsorBlock guidelines before creating new segments.
Show a toast if API is not available
Toast is shown if SponsorBlock is not available.
Toast is not shown if SponsorBlock is not available.
Lets the SponsorBlock leaderboard know how much time is saved. A message is sent to the leaderboard each time a segment is skipped.
Skip count tracking is not enabled.
Segments shorter than this value (in seconds) will not be shown or skipped.
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you.
The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server. Do not change this unless you know what you\'re doing.
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to ReVanced Extended and other SponsorBlock platforms. %s
This includes your private user id. Be sure to share this wisely.

Your settings contain a private SponsorBlock user id.

Your user id is like a password and it should never be shared.
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shout-outs to causes / creators / websites / products they like.
Similar to \'Sponsor\' except for unpaid or self promotion. Includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.
A short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should instead be under self promotion.
The part of the video that most people are looking for.
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, or repeating animation. Does not include transitions containing information.
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information.
Collection of clips that show what is coming up or what happened in the video or in other videos of a series, where all information is repeated elsewhere.
Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Does not include segments providing context or background details.
Only for use in music videos. Sections of music videos without music, that aren\'t already covered by another category.
SponsorBlock temporarily not available (API timed out).
Unable to submit segments (API timed out).
Can\'t submit the segment.\nRate Limited (too many from the same user or IP).
Unable to vote for segment (API timed out).
There are no segments to vote for.
Category is disabled in settings. Enable category to submit.
Set %02d:%02d:%03d as the start or end of a new segment?
The segment lasts from %02d:%02d to %02d:%02d (%d minutes %02d seconds)\nIs it ready to submit?
Start must be before the end.
Mark two locations on the time bar first.
Preview the segment, and ensure it skips smoothly.
Do you want to edit the timing for the start or end of the segment?
Stats temporarily not available (API is down).
Tap here to change your username
Tap here to see the global stats and top contributors.

That\'s %s of their lives.
Tap here to see the leaderboard.
Data is provided by the SponsorBlock API. Tap here to learn more and see downloads for other platforms.
